text.headline: Master in Artificial Intelligence
text.text: Studied at Loyola University from September 2022 until May 2023.

text.headline: Work: Data Analysis, NLP and Vision
text.text: Began working with Oga.ai in July 2023 on current projects involving data analysis, NLP, and computer vision.

text.headline: Loyola Ideas Contest - 2023
text.text: Winner of the competition with an AI robot project in agriculture.

text.headline: Third Edition Ideas Factory
text.text: Winner of the contest with the project Connect and Plant.

text.headline: Internship at Deprom Company
text.text: Process automation internship using Python and Excel carried out in 2019.

text.headline: Action Against Hunger
text.text: Training in Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) in 2018.

text.headline: Master's in Economic Modelling
text.text: Completed at Sorbonne University Paris from September 2021 until 2022.

text.headline: Degree in Economic Analysis
text.text: Studied at Pablo de Olavide University from September 2015 until July 2020.
